snippet.title: GAME’d, A game a month. Feb: Ruh and the Glow
snippet.description:
Our journey with making the second game "Ruh and the Glow" in the series Game'd. A jigsaw puzzle styled children's storybook.

Game'd is a 6-month project where we will make a game and share our learnings along the way. 

Link to Ruh and the Glow :
https://charutak.itch.io/ruh

Link to the first game: 
https://charutak.itch.io/mark
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YZET-0OZTmU

Social Media:
Out of the Loop studio: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/outoftheloo...
Email: outoftheloopstudio@gmail.com

Charu Tak
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/charutak/?h...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/charu_tak

Divya Tak
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/divyatakart/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/divyatakart

Devanshu Tak (who helped us with the awesome wiggle animation)
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/devanshutak25/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcGl8186KfLTe0yeamX3FJA
